moves.1. e4: In this game, White seems to gain rough equality but blunders.
moves.12... h5 13. Bxe6: Why not take the pawn? But it does give Black time to develop.
moves.14... Be7 15. Ncxe4 Qd4+ 16. Kh1 Bxg5 17: I thought White had good prospects here, with two bishops.
moves.17... Rhf8 18. d3 Rae8 19. Bd2: ? A blunder.  White resigns because now the pawns begin to fall and there is a material deficit.
